_header: Ellendune Ellendune thy land is full red
_description: A couplet on the Battle of Ellendune in de Brunne’s translation of Langtoft’s Chronicle

InnerTem5117.Transcription:
Elendoune Elendoune þi lond is fulle redeof þe blode of
                    Bernewolf þer he toke his dede
